verbs.description: pistachio cranberry bark [ARG0: i] [V: picked] up [ARG1: this bark recipe] [ARGM-LOC: at a christmas sweets swap hosted by a woman in my bible study group my family friends] and i think it just divine even my dad who not big on candy loves it —susan wacek pleasanton california susan wacek
